channel.title: pdfcanada.ca - PDF Tools Guides
channel.description: Free guides and tutorials for PDF editing, conversion, and management tools. 100% privacy-focused, no uploads required.

item.title: Ultimate 2026 Guide to PDF Tools - Master Your Documents
item.description: Master PDF management with our definitive 2026 guide. Learn how to edit, merge, and convert PDFs securely using local-first tools.
item.dc:creator: pdfcanada.ca

item.title: How to Delete PDF Pages - Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to remove unwanted pages from PDF documents quickly and securely using our free online tool.

item.title: How to Rotate PDF Pages Permanently - Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: Fix sideways PDF pages permanently with our rotation tool. Save the changes so they stay rotated.

item.title: Convert HEIC to PDF - iPhone Photos Guide
item.description: Convert iPhone HEIC photos to PDF format for easy sharing and printing. Batch conversion supported.

item.title: OCR PDF - Extract Text from Scanned Documents
item.description: Make scanned PDFs searchable and copyable with optical character recognition (OCR). Process locally in your browser.

item.title: How to Make a PDF Fillable - Add Form Fields
item.description: Transform static PDFs into interactive forms with text fields, checkboxes, and more. No expensive software needed.

item.title: Organize PDF Pages - Reorder and Rearrange
item.description: Drag and drop to reorder PDF pages. Reorganize your documents quickly with our free tool.

item.title: Convert EPUB to PDF - eBook Conversion Guide
item.description: Convert eBooks from EPUB format to PDF for printing or sharing. Preserve formatting and layout.

item.title: Convert PDF to EPUB - Create eBooks from PDFs
item.description: Transform PDF documents into EPUB format for better reading on e-readers and tablets.

item.title: Save Email as PDF - Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to save emails as PDF files for archiving and sharing. Works with Gmail, Outlook, and more.

item.title: Convert CBR to PDF - Comic Book Archive Guide
item.description: Convert comic book archives (CBR/CBZ) to PDF format for easier reading and sharing.
